about.heading: About
about.paragraph1: Hi, I’m Iballa Lucia Martinez Yanes — a Masters-trained Dietitian Consultant offering personalised nutrition services tailored to your health goals and lifestyle. I hold a Master’s degree in Dietetics from the University of Limerick, and I’m proudly registered with Coru and a member of the Irish Nutrition & Dietetic Institute (INDI).
about.paragraph2: My approach is rooted in evidence-based practice, empathy, and empowerment. Whether you're managing a medical condition, seeking preventative guidance, or simply striving for balance, I’m here to support you with expert care across Ireland, Spain, and beyond.

review.title: Review Consultation
review.description: 30 minutes — Progress review, adjustments, and continued support.
